definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
having same given name and family name

sentences.english: There are many other same-name cities all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 诸如此类的同名城市世界上还有许多。

sentences.english: Like its mythological namesake, the nebula is associated with a dramatic transformation.
sentences.chinese: 如它的希腊神话同名者，星云与一戏剧性的变化相关。

sentences.english: According to Xie Wanglin's best-selling novel, based on the reality.
sentences.chinese: 根据谢旺霖同名畅销小说改编，真人真事为蓝本。

sentences.english: This is a revised version to the paper with same title.
sentences.chinese: 本文是对同名文章的修改稿。

sentences.english: Ms Stefanie Sun burst onto the Chinese music scene with her eponymous debut album in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 孙燕姿在2000年凭借同名专辑进入华语乐坛。

sentences.english: “The Namesake” is a moving study of the human side of immigration.
sentences.chinese: “同名同姓”是从人的角度来看移民问题的，很感人。

sentences.english: While on tour the band also recorded its self-titled debut album.
sentences.chinese: 在巡演过程中，他们也在灌制首张同名专辑。

sentences.english: This automatically creates a rule with the same name.
sentences.chinese: 这会自动地创建一个同名的规则。

sentences.english: The vein outside skull and homonymic and arterial companion go, but slower to sense of pain.
sentences.chinese: 颅外静脉与同名动脉伴行，但对痛觉较迟钝。

sentences.english: This is second revised version to a paper with same title .
sentences.chinese: 本文是对作者编写的同名文章的第二修改稿。

sentences.english: Most visitors make for the eponymous central temple.
sentences.chinese: 大部分游客慕名去了同名的中区寺庙。

sentences.english: So attention should be paid to the different names of the same substance and th…
sentences.chinese: 这种同物异名和同名异物的情况，应引起注意。

sentences.english: The relation between the two is homonymy .
sentences.chinese: 两者之间的关系是同名。

sentences.english: There is a non-Cuban brand with the same name.
sentences.chinese: 有一个同名的非古巴的品牌。

sentences.english: This film was made based on the homonymy novel.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影是根据同名故事拍摄的。

sentences.english: The novel of the same name by the famous writer Wang Zhijun.
sentences.chinese: 同名小说由著名编剧王志军著。

definition: to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
name (of a person or thing)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to talk about/to narrate/to give an account
to put effort into (work, farming, writing etc)/a masterpiece
representative work (of an author or artist)
